verbose_text: PKA expression was found to be very weakly prognostic for PSA failure (using image analysis as a continuous variable, HR = 1.01, p = 0.03), but stronger for local recurrence (using image analysis with a cut-point of> 2 using a scale of 0-3, HR = 3.66, p = 0.002), and distant metastases (manual analysis with a cut-point of> 2 using a scale of 0-3, HR = 2.27, p = 0.018).
